ingredients: 3 lbs pork shoulder and beef chuck, cut into large chunks and seasoned with salt and pepper
½ cup greek yogurt with a little heavy cream mixed in because I used 2%--if you have whole yogurt use all yogurt
3 cups raw Basmati rice, cooked in salted water
1 large head (or 2 small) of cauliflower, cut into florets
3 T low fat milk (or use 6 T total half and half)
6 medium onions, sliced, caramelized in ghee or butter with salt
